page.title: 15OUR CLASS 3AF
page.content: We did a survey of{3AF}our class, to find out heights,"welshness",places of birth. We found the boys have a greater height than the girls,average for boys was 5 feet 7 inches and for girls it was 5 feet 4 inches.Our class is an "English form" not many speak Welsh especially at home .Only one in fact came from a Welsh household . 16, the majority were born in Wales, 10 were born in England ,1 from Cyprus and 1 from Australia.The most common family size is five. The total number of pupils in the class is 33. The most common surname is Evans. Each year is split into{3}language groups. The{AE/BE}groups speak mainly {English.}The{AF}group is again{English speaking but have a good knowledge of {Welsh.}The{AC/BC}groups are{Welsh speaking and are taught in Welsh.
